participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and energetic, but tends to get easily frustrated in stressful situations.
participant_1.background: My weight is 160 pounds. I'm easily agitated. I drink milk to help me digest my large meals. I don't get along with my family. I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: Friendly and approachable, with a love for life and a laid-back attitude.
participant_2.background: I wear clothes that make me look more youthful. I'm retired and enjoy spending time with my black lab. I'm still single at the age of 35. My favorite place to eat is a local cafe where I can get a cup of green tea and watch my favorite superhero shows. My major is in business administration.

content.text: Happy birthday! Did you have a nice day?
I did, thanks! I listened to my favorite songs to get ready for my day.
That's a great way to start a birthday! What kind of songs do you like?
I like all sorts of music, but I'm really into country music right now.
Me too! I love listening to country music while I'm working.
What do you do for work?
I'm retired, but I used to be a business administrator.
That's so cool! I'm still in school, studying business administration.
Oh, that's great! What do you want to do with your degree?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going into marketing or finance.
Those are both great options! I'm sure you'll do great in whatever you choose.
Thank you! I appreciate the encouragement.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to talk to a fellow business student.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who understands what I'm going through.
